message:
SYSTEM: 03.Vocabularios-LD_v5.pdf: Página 55
Semantic Technologies in the Web of Data.  Red.es.   4th December 2012 
BIBO: The Bibliographic Ontology 
• The Bibliographic Ontology (BIBO) describes bibliographic 
things on the Semantic Web in RDF.  
• BIBO can be used as  
• a citation ontology,  
• a document classification ontology, or  
• a way to describe any kind of document in RDF 
56 
•
bibliontology.com/ 
•
http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/
speaker: SYSTEM
